name: Zombie Dungeon
description:
STORY:

Welcome to challenge~
I'm glad you chose to try this game finally~
Dr. ZEEK attempts to control players'emotions through electronic video games,let your mind be completely destyoyed!
You have to challenge and destroy the plan ultimately.




Please keep your hands flexible,enjoy the next challenge.






4 exotic scene with over 48 different levels
Design and make the level handcrafted instead of automatically generating the program. Please believe it will be your nightmare.





Please pay attention to these bad guys~
They'll always show up in ways you can't imagine,stop you from reaching the end.





Almost forget,you can sue up to 12 different weapons.
I'm sure it's a weapon you've never seen,it's amazing!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Simple game,drag move character to avoid the trap and enemies
  • Unlock more than 4 exotic scene
  • With over 48 handcrafted levels，it took us a while to make it!
  • With over 12 unique weapons
  • Over 6+ enemies with unique abilities
  • Enjoy frustration,over and over
  • Surprise reward awaits who completed all levels!
